/* cetusFileLog.fileLogList */ SELECT CFL.LOG_UID ,CFL.FILE_UID ,CFL.FILE_ID ,CF.ORG_FILE_NM ,CF.EXTENSION AS EXTENSION ,CF.FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE ,CFL.DOWNLOAD_URL ,CFL.WORKER_NM ,TO_CHAR(CFL.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') AS REG_DT FROM CETUS_FILE_LOG CFL INNER JOIN CETUS_FILE CF ON CF.FILE_ID = CFL.FILE_ID WHERE CFL.WORKER_UID = CAST(#{userUid} AS VARCHAR) ORDER BY CFL.REG_DT DESC
OFFSET ${startNumber} LIMIT ${endNumber}
/* cetusFileLog.fileLogCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CETUS_FILE_LOG CFL INNER JOIN CETUS_FILE CF ON CF.FILE_ID = CFL.FILE_ID WHERE CFL.WORKER_UID = CAST(#{userUid} AS VARCHAR)
